Olney Police Department

At the Olney Police Department, we are dedicated to serving our community with integrity, respect, and a steadfast commitment to ethical conduct. Our mission is to make a difference in Olney by fostering a safe and secure environment where all residents can thrive.

Our leadership is guided by a servant heart, ensuring that every decision we make prioritizes the well-being of our community. We believe in leading by example, demonstrating compassion, fairness, and dedication in every action we take.

Our officers are deeply invested in the community, not only as protectors but as active members who participate in local events, support neighborhood initiatives, and build lasting relationships with residents. We are here to listen, to help, and to make a positive impact.
